bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Letter from John M. Willis to Philip Showalter Hench, February 15, 1941

div1.p: Willis sends Hench the negatives which he requested and thanks Hench for a reprint.

div1.head: Letter from John M. Willis to Philip Showalter Hench, February 15, 1941
div1.opener:
MEDICAL FIELD SERVICE SCHOOL
CARLISLE BARRACKS
CARLISLE, PENNSYLVANIA
February 15, 1941
IN REPLY REFER TO:
Dr. P. S. Hench
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minn.
My dear Doctor Hench:
div1.p:
I have your letter of February 10th and am inclosing
herewith the negatives you requested.

Please return them after you have made the prints you
desire.

Thanks for the reprint. It is most interesting and I
am keeping it on file in our Library.

closer.signed:
John M. Willis
Colonel, Medical Corps
Acting Commandant
